content: It follows the Vim's philosophy. There are MODES. Normally you are in NORMAL Mode, where each key you press trigger a Command
A essential concept in TReq is the fact each KEY trigger a ACTION and each Action execute differently based on your current state.
For example, if you press TAB, it triggers the 'SWITCH' action. In Body section it change to Header view, but in Url section it change the method used.
change name of current request's Tab
change visualization between header or body
change to next tab in list
